they survived or they fail together

Evolution now the transition Point

Community we have lots of cells that are

cell muscle cell a brain cell and so on
so these communities began to evolve so
that the interesting level on which
Evolution was taking place was no longer

is Within These communities these
communities of cells again began to
abstract information and they began
building very special structures that

those communities have cell built up and
in fact they began to get specialists in
the community and special structures
that were responsible for
recording understanding learning
information and that was the brains and

point an
individual things learning could happen

that could happen within the lifetime of

structures that would have had to be
learned
evolutionarily over hundreds of
thousands of years by by the individuals

that nervous system the fact that they

time

uh would you please now take the 10% of
